name: Playr
description: Music Player Utilizing OpenWhyd, MusixMatch, and SoundCloud APIs. Playr generates random playlists based off user input and offers a simpler way to listen to music.

name: OneUpDB
description: OneUpDB is a social media site for gamers. Sign up, select your favorite games, add friends, and recommend games to eachother. Search over 250000 games and view ratings and other information.

name: Workout Tracker
description: This application is a workout tracker built with MongoDB and deployed to Heroku. It tracks user-inputted exercises, saves them to MongoDB and creates data visualizations.

name: Employee Directory
description: This application is an employee directory with search and sort functionality built with React.

name: Jon's Burger Joint
description: This application emulates a restaurant, allowing users to eat and throw away burgers. It is built with SQL, with user-inputted burgers being added to a table along with a devoured status that controls which card it is displayed on.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: This application uses the OpenWeather API to gather weather information for user-inputted cities. Data is saved through local storage to retain the cities the user has previously searched for.
